statements: UPDATE bug_reports SET bug_status = 'In Progress' WHERE bug_id = 'f827f9b0-8eaa-4f82-842d-151f662919a5';
UPDATE bug_reports SET resolved = TRUE, reported_at = '2023-10-15 14:30:00' WHERE bug_description = 'UI bug on home screen';
UPDATE bug_reports SET bug_status = 'In Progress', resolved = false WHERE bug_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE bug_reports SET reported_at = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', bug_description = 'Critical Bug', bug_status = 'Open' WHERE reported_by_user_id = '98765432-1010-abcdef-1122-445533221100'
UPDATE bug_reports SET bug_status = 'Fixed', bug_description = 'Security vulnerability patched' WHERE bug_id = 1234;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, loved the graphics!', feedback_rating = 5 WHERE feedback_id = 5678;
UPDATE bug_reports SET bug_status = 'Fixed', reported_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE bug_id = 101
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_rating = 5, submitted_date = '2022-10-20', submitted_by = 'John Doe' WHERE feedback_id = 201
UPDATE BugReports SET status = 'In Progress', reported_on = '2022-08-15 10:00:00' WHERE bug_id = 123;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 5, submitted_on = '2022-08-16 15:30:00', player_name = 'Alice' WHERE feedback_id = 456;
UPDATE BugReports SET status = 'In Progress', reported_on = '2022-01-15' WHERE bug_id = 101;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 5, submitted_on = '2022-01-20', feedback = 'Great experience!' WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE bug_reports SET bug_description = 'Fixed critical bug' WHERE bug_id = 101;
UPDATE player_data SET player_experience = player_experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 202;
UPDATE player_data SET player_level = player_level + 1 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE bug_status SET status = 'Resolved', resolved_by = 'Admin', resolution_date = '2021-09-15' WHERE bug_id = 54321;
UPDATE bug_reports SET status = 'IN_PROGRESS' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE player_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Great experience!' WHERE player_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE bug_reports SET description = 'Fixed a critical bug', status = 'Closed' WHERE id = '7875c890-1a7d-4d3a-ba05-c55f8506a37b';
UPDATE feature_requests SET status = 'In Progress', title = 'New Feature Implementation' WHERE id = 'fc21dfec-5736-428f-a6d0-e517096692ed';
